DecisionTableSourceCriteria.name: DecisionTableSourceCriteria
DecisionTableSourceCriteria.description: Represents the fields and values from a data source that are used to define the condition logic of the data that's used in a decision table.

DecisionTableId.description: The ID of the decision table that’s associated with the source criteria.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Operator.description: The operator that’s applied to an associated decision table’s field to filter the data.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number used in the associated decision table's source condition logic.

SourceFieldName.description: The name of the field that's used in the decision table.

Value.description: The value that’s expected in the source field used in the decision table.

ValueType.description: The type of the value that’s used to filter the source data.
